features: Removes & Soothes: Melts away mascara, eliminates eyeliner and erases eyeshadow, while gentle chamomile soothes dry skin
Tough on makeup, soft on sensitive skin: Gentle enough for all skin types, our eye makeup remover soothes sensitive skin, and is suitable for contact lens wearers
Wipes away makeup in a swipe: Simply apply a small amount to a pad, gently sweep over your eyes and rinse with water
Quality ingredients with a positive impact: Our eye makeup remover is enriched with English chamomile extract from Norfolk, known for its soothing effect on skin

Business as a force for good: Since 1976, we’ve been more than a beauty brand; We offer products and beauty rituals for everyone – 100% Vegetarian Beauty, Forever Against Animal Testing, with Hardworking Natural Origin Ingredients
body.description: Product Description Melts away mascara, eliminates eyeliner, erases eyeshadow. Say hello to our Camomile Gentle Eye Make-Up Remover. Whether you fancy a smokey eye, winged liner or an explosion of glitter all over your lids, gentle eye makeup removers should be your best friend. So let us introduce you to our Camomile Eye Make-Up Remover. It’s tough on makeup but kind to your delicate skin as it helps to melt makeup from lashes and lids and soothe both dry sensitive skin and contact lens wearers alike. Enriched with camomile extract, this luxurious bottle of eye makeup remover for sensitive skin feels silky soft. It will help to remove every last trace of eye makeup, leaving your skin feeling cleansed. Bye-bye panda eyes. Curious about the rest of our Camomile range? You should be. Gentle enough for all skin types, it not only includes The Body Shop’s eye makeup remover, but also our bestselling Camomile Sumptuous Cleansing Butter that helps to break down makeup across your entire face. We’ll get you back to feeling bare faced and beautiful. From the Manufacturer The Body Shop Camomile Gentle Eye Makeup Remover effectively removes eye make-up, while gently soothing and conditioning the skin around the delicate eye area, as well as the eyelashes. This gentle formula is paraben-free, silicone-free, gluten-free and 100% vegan.

Gets to work on your makeup with minimum fuss

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle yet effective Eye Make Up Remover
reviews.reviewText: This is the only eye make up remover I can use without having an allergic reaction. I absolutely love it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 3, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars And this works great, I put some on some soft paper towel ...
reviews.reviewText: I've been hunting for a makeup remover that works for my eyes. I used to use coconut oil due to the craze over it, but coconut oil leaves a oily film in my eye and creates a bit of blockage in my eyelids so I started to develop small cyst every so often. So I've been on a hunt for new makeup remover especially for my tough waterproof mascara! And this works great, I put some on some soft paper towel piece and put it over my eyes for 10-20 seconds and my mascara slides right off! And I don't have to wipe off any excess oil or residue from the makeup remover unlike coconut oil. The makeup remove dries down, doesn't irritate my eyes or cheeks (some products tend to make my cheeks burn). I remember buying this and I couldn't find it two weeks later and I immediately bought another bottle because I couldn't wait! So all in all, I really love this product!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I've used this for years and love it
reviews.reviewText: I bought enough for the rest of my days... I hope.It's a great product and have used it for years and find it very gentle.I don't know if it works or waterproof eye makeup though since I don't wear waterproof mascara.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 23, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent non-greasy eye makeup remover.
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this eye makeup remover for years. It's without a doubt the best. It's gentle, non-greasy and does a good job. Better that more expensive brands I've tried.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 1, 2015
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for makeup removal and more
reviews.reviewText: This has become SO much more than just a makeup for me. Now, it is NOT for waterproof mascara. Regular, maybe, but not waterproof. That said, it doesn't sting my eyes when I swipe the cotton pad across my eyes to remove shadow and under-eye concealer.But I've promoted it to "Dry Winter Morning Facial Cleanser," since it is both gentle and cleansing at the same time. Isimply pour a moderate amount onto a cotton pad and swipe it all over my face, repeating with a second application if necessary, then rinsing with either a wash cloth or just plain splashing water. In milder, non-dry weather I want a little more thorough cleansing, I simply add a dollop of regular gentle facial cleanser (Cetaphil/Aquanil, Vanicream Gentle Foaming, CeraVe Foaming, Neutrogena Ultra, etc) and it cleanses well without drying out my skin at all.It IS, however, pricey. I could say a little goes a long way, but it doesn't. It's basically water with very mild detergents in it and it pours out like water. I usually use 2 applications. But I imagine nearly ever other makeup remover in the market could be used this way, most of them much cheaper than this one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars I'm honestly surprised about the quality.
reviews.reviewText: I got this for Prime Day because I have super sensitive skin that is both dry and oily AND I wear contacts. I usually buy Lush's make up remover Ultrabland but I felt like I needed to cut my costs a bit. This stuff takes off my e.l.f. make up and Ruby Woo lipstick just great! I use it with a washable cloth and everything comes off! I don't have to rub too hard and I go over my make up twice at most to make sure everything is off.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle warrior on makeup and baseball black out stick!
reviews.reviewText: I have super sensitive skin and allergies to most agents (or more accurately, the chemicals used to make them). But I've been using this for years. It's so gentle and removes makeup with just a gentle swipe - no scrubbing needed.My grandson uses black out stick on his face when he plays baseball, and practically shreds his skin to remove it. When i suggested he try my Chamomile remover he scoffed... until he tried it. Then he begged for me to get him a bottle of his own. Now that handsome face is clean and protected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Non irritating, non greasy
reviews.reviewText: This is the only eye makeup remover I've ever used that does not irritate my eyes. I had gotten to the point where I only used tubing mascara so I wouldn't have to use anything on my eyes except water. This removes waterproof mascara and doesn't leave my face greasy like others. It also doesn't have a scent, which is a big plus. I use it on a microfiber face cloth to remove makeup.

reviews.reviewTitle: Very gentle mascara and shadow remover
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this product for a number of years, it lasts a really long time, depending how often you wear makeup of course but I have mine near a year a little does the job for me. I really like the gentleness of it on my eyes and doesn't leave my eyes with an oily film like some do. I wear water based mascara I don't know about oil based mascara removal, probably not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good, no nonsence product. Quick unproblematic dispatch. Thank you.
In des meilers demaquillant pour les yeux
Das ist der beste Makeup Entferner den es gibt!!!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 15, 2021
reviews.reviewText: There is not a scent on this remover. I have very sensitive eyes and I have not had any allergic reactions. The sheerness removes the eye make so easily. Dont use a lot. Best I have ever used.
